title: MC_TRACK_TR (Struct)
text:
TYPE MC_TRACK_TR : STRUCT
Part of the
MC_TRACK_REF
data structure.

rows.Name: OnCompensation
rows.Comment:
A delay (value positive) or an early switch-on (value negative) can be set. The time is given in seconds.
May affect whether the switch is inverted or not.
See the outputSwitchCorruptedofMC_DigitalCamSwitch.
Always used for switching ON, regardless the direction of the axis.

rows.Name: OffCompensation
rows.Comment:
A delay (value positive) or an early switch-off (value negative) can be set. The time is given in seconds.
May affect whether the switch is inverted or not.
See the outputSwitchCorruptedofMC_DigitalCamSwitch.
Not used in time-based mode.
Always used for switching OFF, regardless the direction of the axis.

rows.Name: Hysteresis
rows.Comment:
Additionally, a hysteresis can be set, which avoids a permanent switching of the output,
which might occur e.g. if the servo-controller is exactly in switch-position and slightly swinging
around that position due to the position control.
A track wonât switch if the distance to the last switching position is smaller than this variable.
